system.requirements: Rogue Trader, Explorator, Misisonary, Seneschal, or Void-Master. RT Rank 1+, Intelligence 40+. Uncovered at least one lost holy relic, researched its origins, and determined its place within the Imperial Creed

description.value:
A Somewhat Pious Treasure Hunter, delving into ancient and lost worlds searching for long-lost relics of the imperial faith. Studying diligently to comprehend ancient scriptures and scraps of forgotten text.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Reliquartist Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Discerning Eye

system.effect:
Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Reliquartist
Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Discerning Eye
